feed.title: Even simpler minimum fee calculation formula: f > bounty*fork_rate/average_blocksize

entry.title: Even simpler minimum fee calculation formula: f > bounty*fork_rate/average_blocksize
entry.summary: Peter Todd, on November 15, 2013, wrote an email with the subject line "\documentclass{article}" which contained a link to a PDF document. The document is related to moon language and its conversion from LaTeX to PDF format. The PDF file was hosted on a website called Xiph.org, belonging to Greg Maxwell.
